title: Architect - USA - Contemporary Remodel
job_overview:
Seeking Architectural Designer for Contemporary U.S. Residential Project

I am a builder in Georgia, USA and need professional architectural plans for a home addition. Our client desires a clean, contemporary style. The two most critical requirements for this partnership are:

A  strong portfolio showcasing contemporary and modern residential design.

A strong knowledge of U.S. construction practices, codes, and standard building materials. 

The plans need to be practical and buildable.
